channel.title: 317 Socket Connection Information?
channel.description: I was wondering what exact data is sent back and forth so I can work on my own special client. Its definetely TCP protocol and I have the connections made and everything but I need to information so it can complete the log in fully. Any help greatly appreciated. JUST ENOUGH TO MAKE A FULL LOGIN
